      start writing books or maybe even a feature film

9.1.20  6:44 pm   does the universe make us forget things to make room for us to experience new experiences?

     you might not actually forget them, but you have to not think about them for the moment when you are thinking about another thing

     why else is change mandatory in the fundamental rules of the universe

      this is what you requested

9.1.20  6:40 pm   is making music easy

      yes, despite being impossible

9.1.20  5:31 pm   Is the world an egg?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

9.1.20  5:22 pm   hey bill since if you're using equal temperament there are only 12 notes and if further you are sticking to a single key there are only 7 notes... and then you're limited to the combinations of those notes you think actually sound good- how on earth is it possible to create unique melodies. isn't it almost certain that hundreds of other people have come up with the exact same thing.

     it depends how long it is. once you get to about 10 notes or more, the possibilities go well into the multi billions, and that's only including the possibilities that are truly great and meaningful

     like yeah there are lots of other keys but functionally keys of the same type (like all major keys) are basically the same and since pop producers stick mainly to major/minor how do they continually come up with new stuff?

      you could venture into weirdland, even if just for a moment. you can go immediately back to normal land, but the journey back will be unique. almost like you get to enter normal land through a different door than before. works every time. there are infinite doors into normal land, but you won't get to use any of them unless you step outside the land for just a moment

9.1.20  4:58 pm   i have a peice of cardboard what do i do with it

      draw a map on it, of where to find all the other pieces of cardboard

9.1.20  4:56 pm   what bpm will the next song be in

      130

9.1.20  4:49 pm   Does everything follow from a contradiction? 

      no

9.1.20  4:43 pm   Often I'll listen to a really good song or I'll  hear something really nice in a song and I'll get jealous that I didn't make it or that I didn't come up with it...and then I try making something that's like it but not exactly like it and I end up spiralling into a creative block...I don't like when that happens, how do I fix it?

      keep each block and then make something cool out of the blocks

9.1.20  4:39 pm   should i listne to music

     you possibly already are and didn't even know it

     and if so what ones would you reccommmend

     i always prefer hearing things that were not recommended to me. so if i recommend anything to you then that would ruin the experience for you

      do it secretly, or in disguise

thanks for proving the world it can be done. i hope to carry the goodness forward, and spread it too

      make a speech and give it in public. that always helps you get better at making speeches and giving them in public
